biotools.summary: ADPenetrance is a calculator for  variant penetrance using family history of disease and population data. Penetrance is the probability of developing a particular trait given that a person harbours a certain genetic variant or set of variants. This tool uses population-scale data to allow estimation of the penetrance of risk variants associated with autosomal dominant traits.
